summary:
Dwemer Shelves Modders Resource

Static Meshes:
6 Vanilla Dwemer Shelves (feet removed)
2 Small Shelves (based on the dresser)
2 Cube Shelves
6 Simple Shelves with wall mounts
Container Mesh:
1 Dwemer Dresser (feet removed)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Dwemer Shelves Modder's Resource [/size]


[size=3]Contents:[/size]

Static Meshes:
6 Vanilla Dwemer Shelves (feet removed)
2 Small Shelves (based on the dresser)
2 Cube Shelves
6 Simple Shelves with wall mounts
Container Mesh:
1 Dwemer Dresser (feet removed)
+
DwemerShelvesResource.esp with all items in a resource cell + shelves preconfigured to be used as bookshelves  (you can simply copy&paste the items into your own mod)
Remember if you use these in your own mod, you need to load your mod as active esp, and this esp as non-active. Then when you copy the
bookshelves to your mod cell, you need to rename them to something else to make them appear on your esp.

[size=3]Version:[/size]

1.2
-fixed distorted UV on dresser and small shelves
1.1
-applied MOPP Collision Crash Fixer to all meshes to prevent a rare bug - please [u]update if you already downloaded V1.0[/u]


[size=3]Credits:[/size]

Bethesda for the vanilla meshes
Elianora for the .esp, idea and screenshots
gunslinger6792 for the idea


[size=3]Tools used:[/size]

Blender 2.49b
Niftools (NifSkope,Nif Scripts,PyFFI)
Chunkmerge
Chunkmerge MOPP Collision Crash Fixer
Creation Kit


[size=3]Permission:[/size]

The meshes can be used in your own [u][b]Skyrim[/b][/u] mods as long as you give me proper credits.
author: Nostromo79
